forecast.day_comments: A 30 percent chance of snow showers.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 7. Calm wind.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow showers before 9am, then a slight chance of snow showers after noon.  Partly sunny, with a high near 16. Calm wind becoming northwest around 6 mph in the afternoon.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
